text: Alagappa Chettiar College of Engineering and Technology (ACCET-Karaikudi) is an autonomous (with effect from 2009) college of engineering in Karaikudi, Tamil Nadu, India. It was established in 1952. The college is under the control of the state government. It is a member institute under the Technical Education Quality Improvement Programme in India (11 colleges were selected from Tamil Nadu). == Other websites == * Category:Engineering schools Category:Colleges and universities in India Category:Sivaganga district Category:1952 establishments in Asia Category:1950s establishments in India
title: Alagappa Chettiar College of Engineering and Technology
